experience: You and Yuval both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Steven Roberts, and 53 others
If you are in town, feel free to join us tomorrow morning for a wonderful set of business events.  A raffle prize will be drawn from the business cards of those in attendance.
Find the perfect gifts in every price range for your team, partners and clients at Microsoft Store.  Just reach out to me if you would like to discuss the possibilities at yuval.yisrael@microsoft.com
"The biggest global launch in Xbox history." Exciting to see #XboxOneX celebrated around the world! #MSFTAdvocate

My role as BSS here within the Microsoft Retail Division utilizes my skills as a strategic thinker and a strong collaborator, as well as my impeccable leadership, planning and execution skills. I am focused on driving results while building strong relationships from EPG to SoHo. Education, & micro business markets are also a focus and my years of experience across these markets is vital to our success inn penetrating these markets. I also interact deeply with in-store & regional market leadership as well as our North American SMSG field team members.I optimize business sale leads from within the Microsoft Store as well as generate new business within the State of Arizona. The main goal is to deliver results around our devices & services.Besides margin dollar generation and satisfaction scores, I am also expected to always improve the Store’s team productivity and operational efficiency.I enjoy the opportunity I have been given to interact across many organizations, and the opportunity to impact, shape and simplify Microsoft's business for an even greater global impact.

Performed all phases of business management, marketing and creative consulting with companies targeting Internet, multimedia, video, photography, CD-ROM and pre-press technology services.  Advised clients of creative solutions for advertising, corporate marketing and communications, product marketing, promotions, interactive CD-ROM development, video/audio production and e-commerce technologies.

Recruited to take over the creative re-structuring process for a rapidly expanding start-up company.  Successful sales penetration into key enterprise accounts including Colonial Penn, Enterprise, Keystone and BASF.  Directly responsible for substantially increasing the company’s visibility, which resulted in the merger & acquisition of GO Media, Inc by Ensera, Inc which was then acquired by Mitchell International, Inc.

Served as an independent value-added dealer and systems integrator for over 600 product vendors, including Silicon Graphics, Adobe, Alias, Apple, Avid, Tektronix, Sony, SoftImage, Wavefront, Macromedia, Discreet Logic and Panasonic.  Successfully penetrated key television, government and enterprise accounts, including ABC, NBC, CBS, Motorola, American Express, Bank One, Allied Signal, Honeywell, Rhino Productions, U.S. Government, Bureau of Land Management and the Cities of Scottsdale, Phoenix and Albuquerque.

Founded one of America’s first Post-production facilities specializing in 2D and 3D graphics and animation, interactive storyboard development, wire removal, character morphing, motion tracking and interactive set design.  Recruited, hired and led a team of highly experienced professionals in the design of innovative marketing and communication services to support the needs of a high profile and eclectic fortune 5000 client base.

Yuval brought natural leadership to the teams he led and always keept his projects moving forward while we worked together at GO Media. Team members could always rely on Yuval for day to day guidance and support. Even people outside his  team sought him out for guidance or support. Yuval is also good at recognizing the potential in others, is very good at seeing the big picture, and making suggestions for improvement, espcecially with customers and their needs. I would say that some of Yuval's greatest strenghths lie in his good instincts, leadership, and his personability with his peers and mostly, the customer. Yuval is hard-working, dedicated and a valuable asset to any team.Yuval is a genunine and sincere individual who possesses a high level of integrity. It was pleasure to work with and would give him the highest recommendation to anyone who is seeking such a creative and dedicated individual.

summary: Seasoned Executive experienced in the conceptualization, design and integration of entire creative business philosophies, components and solutions from initial ground floor start-up’s to established corporate operations.  Extensive corporate management experience with enterprise and B2B sales comprising an early career foundation.  Skilled in closing corporate sales, customer communication strategies, brand identity, and overall corporate marketing presence including site design, global identity, e-commerce implementation, brand initiatives, usability, training, promotion and advertising.Aggressive in securing new business by working on client presentations and proposals and pitching them directly, utilizing excellent listening, communication and visualization techniques.Disciplined in the use and training of a variety of cutting edge software applications, including business management, graphic design, photography, 3D animation, website design, video and audio production.
